forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.
